text.div:
Hepatitis B Virus Infection (Tests for hepatitis B virus IgM Antibody)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    22319-8 Hepatitis B virus core IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum
    24113-3 Hepatitis B virus core IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    31204-1 Hepatitis B virus core IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum
    51658-3 Hepatitis B virus core IgM Ab [Presence] in Body fluid
    5185-4 Hepatitis B virus core IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    5186-2 Hepatitis B virus core IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum by Radioimmunoassay (RIA)
    51914-0 Hepatitis B virus core IgG+IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum
    83100-8 Hepatitis B virus core IgG+IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
